data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Akola that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Akola, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,953 believers in Akola to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,793,947 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Akola do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 19,953 believers in Akola, Maharashtra, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Khatik (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
God, we pray for the believers in Akola, Maharashtra, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,813,900 people living in Akola, Maharashtra, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Akola against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.
